KN-Series Plus Condensing Cast Iron Boiler by Advanced Thermal Hydronics
-     Factory assembled cast iron heat exchanger
-     Secondary heat exchanger with onboard bypass pump
-     Air fuel coupled with modulating Dungs gas valve
-     CSD-1 and FM Compliant gas train
-     Common header supply sensor 10k shipped loose
25HP premium efficient, ODP motor w/ shaft grounding rings
Excludes:  Field alignment, field impeller trim and start-up
Unless otherwise noted, this quotation is offered as follows.  Shipments are F.O.B. point of manufacture with freight allowed to first destination.  Payments terms are Net
30 Days.  Sales and use taxes are not included.  Quotation is subject to acceptance within 30 days.  Prices quoted are firm provided release to ship is made within 30
days from date of order, not to exceed 60 days from the date of this quotation.  All quotations and sales are made in accordance with CFM COMPANY - STANDARD
TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF SALE included on the last page of this quotation.
